MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G67 postcode area of Cumbernauld, affecting properties in Stirling Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.57AM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are working to install generators for the rest of our customers without power while we investigate the fault. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 9.16AM on 25 April 2021.
